name: Thomas Bush | Tster
tagline: Freelance graphics designer, video editor and writer; from a land where tea guides the way...
body:
I am a freelance graphics designer, video editor and writer from England. Below you can check out my 'creations'.

Want something done? Send me an email at 'bushthomas@hotmail.com'.

If you want to support my work, you can always [donate to me](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=UP43DVGEEQ7M8) via PayPal.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
